inclusion.criterion: Pediatric patients with type 2 diabetes according to ADA
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who have not previously received anti-diabetic treatment or have been treated solely with diet and exercise or have received only one anti-diabetic agent, and who have not applied insulin within 1 month of study start.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Stable body weight at least 3 months before study start.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Free of other infectious, chronic, or acute inflammatory processes in the 3 months prior to study.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Previous informed consent signed (both children and parents or guardians).
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Chronic renal failure or serum creatinine over 1.0 mg/dl.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Active hepatic disease (ALT and AST 3 times normal)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: A 5 months old male with empty scrotum at the right side, palpable testis in the left scrotum. No developmental delay and normal physical assessment.
